actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To require brokers, dealers, investment companies, and investment advisers to protect the confidentiality of financial information obtained concerning their customers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Securities Investors Privacy Enhancement Act of 1999
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Securities Investors Privacy Enhancement Act of 1999 - Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to prescribe guidelines under which registered securities associations and the Securities and Exchange Commission shall adopt rules and regulations requiring brokers and dealers to protect the confidentiality of financial information relating to their customers.

titles.title: Securities Investors Privacy Enhancement Act of 1999
To require brokers, dealers, investment companies, and investment advisers to protect the confidentiality of financial information obtained concerning their customers, and for other purposes.
